value.info_text:
For the next 5 turns you displace 12%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 33% of any damage you receive onto a random enemy.

While Webs of Fate is active you may gain one additional Spin per turn and your maximum Spin is doubled.
value.name: Webs of Fate

value2.info_text:
For the next 5 turns you displace 12%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 33% of any damage you receive onto a random enemy.

While Webs of Fate is active you may gain one additional Spin per turn and your maximum Spin is doubled.
value2.name: Webs of Fate

value.info_text:
This intricate spell instantly erects a time shield around the caster, preventing any incoming damage and sending it forward in time.

Once either the maximum damage (363, 475, 561, 635, 700) is absorbed, or the time runs out (6, 7, 8, 10, 11 turns), the stored damage will return as a temporal restoration field over time (5 turns).

Each turn the restoration field is active, you get healed for 10% of the absorbed damage.

While under the effect of Time Shield, all newly applied magical, physical and mental effects will have their durations reduced by 42%, 45%, 47%, 50%, 53%.

The shield's max absorption will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Time Shield

value2.info_text:
This intricate spell instantly erects a time shield around the caster, preventing any incoming damage and sending it forward in time.

Once either the maximum damage (363, 475, 561, 635, 700) is absorbed, or the time runs out (6, 7, 8, 10, 11 turns), the stored damage will return as a temporal restoration field over time (5 turns).

Each turn the restoration field is active, you get healed for 10% of the absorbed damage.

While under the effect of Time Shield, all newly applied magical, physical and mental effects will have their durations reduced by 42%, 45%, 47%, 50%, 53%.

The shield's max absorption will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Time Shield

value.info_text:
When you hit with a melee or arrow attack, there is a 33%, 42%, 47%, 50%, 52% chance that a warden will appear from another timeline to attack a random enemy.

The summoned warden will attempt a melee attack if you made an arrow attack, or an arrow attack if you made a melee attack.

These wardens are out of phase with your reality and deal 36%, 27%, 22%, 19%, 17% less damage, and their arrows will pass through friendly targets.

A warden can only be summoned this way once per turn and they return to their own timeline after attacking.
value.name: Warden's Call

value2.info_text:
When you hit with a melee or arrow attack a warden may appear from another timeline, depending on available space, and shoot or attack a random enemy.

The wardens are out of phase with this reality and deal 78%, 55%, 44%, 39%, 35% less damage but the bow warden's arrows will pass through friendly targets.

This effect can only occur once per turn and the wardens return to their own timeline after attacking.
value2.name: Warden's Call

value.info_text:
For the next 3, 5, 6, 8, 9 turns two alternate versions of you enter your timeline. While the effect is active all damage done by you or your copies is reduced by two thirds and all damage received is split between the three of you.

Temporal Fugue does not normally cooldown while active. You may take direct control of your clones, give them orders, and set their talent usage.

Damage you deal to Fugue Clones or that they deal to you or each other is reduced to zero.
value.name: Temporal Fugue

value2.info_text:
For the next 3, 5, 6, 8, 9 turns two alternate versions of you enter your timeline. While the effect is active all damage done by you or your copies is reduced by two thirds and all damage received is split between the three of you.

Temporal Fugue does not normally cooldown while active. You may take direct control of your clones, give them orders, and set their talent usage.

Damage you deal to Fugue Clones or that they deal to you or each other is reduced to zero.
value2.name: Temporal Fugue

value.info_text:
Creates a temporal echo in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 around you. Affected targets take 149, 202, 243, 278, 309 temporal damage, as well as up to 22%, 31%, 36%, 40%, 43% of the difference between their current life and max life as additional temporal damage.

The additional damage will be divided by the target's rank and the damage scales with your Spellpower.
value.name: Echoes From The Past

value2.info_text:
Creates a temporal echo in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 around you. Affected target take 149, 202, 243, 278, 309 temporal damage, as well as up to 22%, 31%, 36%, 40%, 43% of the difference between their current life and max life as additional temporal damage.

The additional damage will be divided by the target's rank and the damage scales with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Echoes From The Past

value.info_text:
Let hate fuel your movements. While active, you gain 60%, 79%, 94%, 106%, 116% movement speed. The recklessness of your movement brings you bad luck (Luck -3).

Cleave, Repel and Surge cannot be active simultaneously, and activating one will place the others in cooldown.

The speed of your movements, combined with the balance and utility of two weapons, gives you 17, 22, 26, 29, 32 extra Defense while dual-wielding.

Movement speed and dual-wielding Defense both increase with the Willpower stat.
value.name: Surge

value2.info_text:
Let hate fuel your movements. While active, you gain 60%, 79%, 94%, 106%, 116% movement speed. The recklessness of your movement brings you bad luck (Luck -3).

Cleave, Repel and Surge cannot be active simultaneously, and activating one will place the others in cooldown.

The speed of your movements, combined with the balance and utility of two weapons, gives you 17, 22, 26, 29, 32 extra Defense while dual-wielding.

Movement speed and dual-wielding Defense both increase with with the Willpower stat.
value2.name: Surge

value.info_text:
You learn to mimic the strengths of your prey. Killing a marked sub-type raises your stats to match the strengths of the victim (up to a maximum of 8, 13, 18, 22, 26 total points, subject to your current effectiveness). The effect lasts indefinitely, but only the effects of the latest kill will be applied.

Each point in Mimic reduces the kill experience required to reach 100% effectivess as a Predator.
value.name: Mimic

value2.info_text:
You learn to mimic the strengths of your prey. Killing a marked sub-type raises your stats to match the strengths of the victim (up to a maximum of 8, 13, 18, 22, 26 total points, subject to your current effectiveness). The effect lasts indefinitely, but only the effects of the lastest kill will be applied.

Each point in Mimic reduces the kill experience required to reach 100% effectivess as a Predator.
value2.name: Mimic

value.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
value.info_text: Activate the rune to create a protective shield absorbing and reflecting at most 0 damage for 0 turns.
value.name: Rune: Reflection Shield

The effect will scale with your magic stat.
value2.name: Rune: Reflection Shield

value.info_text:
Activate the rune to unleash a manasurge upon yourself, increasing mana regeneration by 0% for 0 turns and instantly restoring 0 mana.

Also when resting your mana will regenerate at 0.5 per turn.
value.name: Rune: Manasurge

value2.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
value2.info_text:
Activate the rune to unleash a manasurge upon yourself, increasing mana regeneration by 0% over 0 turns and instantly restoring 0 mana.

Also when resting your mana will regenerate at 0.5 per turn.
value2.name: Rune: Manasurge

value.info_text:
An ogre's body is acclimated to spells and inscriptions.

Increases spell save by 6, 11, 16, 20, 24 and improves the contribution of primary stats on infusions and runes by 17%, 27%, 34%, 40%, 46%.

At level 5 your body is so strong you can use a two handed weapon in your main hand while still using an offhand item.

When using a two handed weapon this way you suffer a 20% physical power, spellpower and mindpower penalty, decreasing by 5% per size category above big; also all damage procs from your weapons are reduced by 50%.
value.name: Grisly Constitution

value2.info_text:
An ogre's body is acclimated to spells and inscriptions.

Increases spell save by 6, 11, 16, 20, 24 and improves the contribution of primary stats on infusions and runes by 17%, 27%, 34%, 40%, 46%.

At level 5 your body is so strong you can use a two handed weapon in your main hand while still using an offhand item.

When using a two handed weapon this way you suffer a 20% physical power, spellpower and mindpower penalty, decreasing by 5% per size category above big; also all damage procs from your offhand are reduced by 50%.
value2.name: Grisly Constitution

value.info_text:
Crush and consume one of your captured souls, healing you for 404, 534, 634, 720, 795 life and restoring 134, 178, 211, 240, 265 mana.

The life and mana healed will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Consume Soul

value2.info_text:
Crush and consume one of your captured souls, healing your for 404, 534, 634, 720, 795 life and restoring 134, 178, 211, 240, 265 mana.

The life and mana healed will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Consume Soul

value.info_text:
Fire a powerful beam of stone-shaterring force, digging out any walls in its path up to 1, 3, 4, 5, 5.

The beam also affect any creatures in its path, dealing 206, 279, 336, 384, 426 physical damage to all.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Pulverizing Auger

value2.info_text:
Fire a powerful beam of stone shaterring forces, digging out any walls in its path up to 1, 3, 4, 5, 5.

The beam also affect any creatures in its path, dealing 206, 279, 336, 384, 426 physical damage to all.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Pulverizing Auger

value.info_text:
Conjures 2, 2, 2, 3, 3 missile-shaped rocks that you target individually at any target or targets in range. Each missile deals 68, 92, 110, 126, 140 physical damage, and an additional 11, 15, 18, 21, 23 bleeding damage every turn for 5 turns.

At talent level 5, you can conjure one additional missile.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Earthen Missiles

value2.info_text:
Conjures 2, 2, 2, 3, 3 missile shaped rocks that you target individually at any target or targets in range. Each missile deals 68, 92, 110, 126, 140 physical damage, and an additional 11, 15, 18, 21, 23 bleeding damage every turn for 5 turns.

At talent level 5, you can conjure one additional missile.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Earthen Missiles

value.info_text:
Carve 40 to 80 alchemist gems out of a natural gemstone.

Alchemist gems are used for many other spells, and each gem type creates a different effect.
value.name: Create Alchemist Gems

value2.info_text:
Carve 40 to 80 alchemist gems out of a natural gemstone.

Alchemists gems are used for many other spells, and each gem type creates a different effect.
value2.name: Create Alchemist Gems

value.info_text: Crush 5 alchemist gems into dust to mark impassable terrain next to you. You immediately enter it and appear on the other side of the obstacle, up to 15, 19, 23, 26, 28 grids away.
value.name: Gem Portal

value2.info_text: Crush 5 alchemists gems into dust to mark impassable terrain next to you. You immediately enter it and appear on the other side of the obstacle, up to 15, 19, 23, 26, 28 grids away.
value2.name: Gem Portal

value.info_text:
A wall of water rushes out from the caster with an initial radius of 1, increasing by 1 per turn to a maximum radius of 3, 4, 4, 5, 5, doing 29, 40, 48, 55, 61 cold damage and 29, 40, 48, 55, 61 physical damage to all inside, as well as knocking back targets each turn.

The tidal wave lasts for 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

All creatures hit gain the wet effect, which reduces their stun/freeze immunity by half and interacts with other cold spells.

The damage and duration will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Tidal Wave

value2.info_text:
A wall of water rushes out from the caster with an initial radius of 1, increasing 1 per turn to a maximum eventual radius of 3, 4, 4, 5, 5, doing 29, 40, 48, 55, 61 cold damage and 29, 40, 48, 55, 61 physical damage to all inside, as well as knocking back targets each turn.

The tidal wave lasts for 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

All creatures hit gain the wet effect which reduces their stun/freeze resistance by half of their value and interracts with other cold spells.

The damage and duration will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Tidal Wave

value.info_text:
You have learned to block incoming blows with your weapons. When dual wielding, your defense is increased by 25, 34, 40, 46, 51.

The Defense bonus scales with your Dexterity.At talent levels higher than 5, you may parry melee attacks with your offhand weapon (except mindstars).

(You currently have a 0%, 0%, 0%, 3%, 23% chance to deflect up to 0 damage (0%, 0%, 0%, 0%, 15% of your offhand weapon damage) from approximately 0.0, 0.6, 1.3, 1.8, 2.2 melee attacks (based on your Cunning) each turn.)
value.name: Dual Weapon Defense

value2.info_text:
You have learned to block incoming blows with your weapons. When dual wielding, your defense is increased by 25, 34, 40, 46, 51.

The Defense bonus scales with your Dexterity. At talent levels higher than 5, you may parry melee attacks with your offhand weapon (except mindstars).

(You currently have a 0%, 0%, 0%, 3%, 23% chance to deflect up to 0 damage (0%, 0%, 0%, 0%, 15% of your offhand weapon damage) from approximately 0.0, 0.6, 1.3, 1.8, 2.2 melee attacks (based on your Cunning) each turn.)
value2.name: Dual Weapon Defense

value.info_text:
Meditate on your link with Nature.

While meditating, you regenerate 9, 12, 14, 16, 18 equilibrium per turn, your Mental Save is increased by 30, 39, 46, 52, 57, and your healing factor increases by 23%, 30%, 35%, 40%, 43%.

Your deep meditation does not, however, let you deal damage correctly, reducing the damage you and your summons deal by 50%.

Also, any time you are resting (even with Meditation not sustained) you enter a simple meditative state that lets you regenerate 0.50, 1.00, 1.50, 2.00, 2.50 equilibrium per turn.

The effects will increase with your Mindpower.
value.name: Meditation

value2.info_text:
Meditate on your link with Nature.

While meditating, you regenerate 9, 12, 14, 16, 18 equilibrium per turn, your Mental Save is increased by 30, 39, 46, 52, 57, and your healing factor increases by 23%, 30%, 35%, 40%, 43%.

Your deep meditation does not, however, let you deal damage correctly, reducing your damage done by 50%.

Also, any time you are resting (even with Meditation not sustained) you enter a simple meditative state that lets you regenerate 0.50, 1.00, 1.50, 2.00, 2.50 equilibrium per turn.

The effects will increase with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Meditation

value.info_text:
Channel your mental power through your wielded mindstars, generating psionic blades.

Mindstar psiblades have their damage modifiers (how much damage they gain from stats) multiplied by 1.45, 1.60, 1.72, 1.81, 1.90, their armour penetration by 1.23, 1.47, 1.66, 1.81, 1.95 and mindpower, willpower and cunning by 1.45, 1.60, 1.72, 1.81, 1.90.

Also increases Physical Power by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65 and increases weapon damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% when using mindstars.
value.name: Psiblades

value2.info_text:
Channel your mental power through your wielded mindstars, generating psionic blades sprouting from the mindstars.

Mindstar psiblades have their damage modifiers (how much damage they gain from stats) multiplied by 1.45, 1.60, 1.72, 1.81, 1.90, their armour penetration by 1.23, 1.47, 1.66, 1.81, 1.95 and mindpower, willpower and cunning by 1.45, 1.60, 1.72, 1.81, 1.90.

Also increases Physical Power by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65 and increases weapon damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% when using mindstars.
value2.name: Psiblades
